Title: Relates to the use of biometric data for marketing purposes
Summary: Relates to prohibiting private entities from using biometric data for any advertising, detailing, marketing, promotion, or any other activity that is intended to be used to influence business volume, sales or market share or to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing practices or marketing personnel.
LawCode: Add ยง399-dddd, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the use of biometric data for marketing purposes
